title: Thankfulness in grain: or a good life the best return. Delivered in another sermon on the same occasion in St. Dionis, Back-Church, Aug. 14. 1653. By Nath. Hardy, Master of Arts, and preacher to that parish.
author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
publisher: Printed by T.W. for Nath. Webb and Will. Grantham, at the sign of the Black Bear in St. Paul's Church-yard, near the little North-door,
